info.name: CLARIN Switchboard bridge
info.summary: The Switchboard bridge sends selected files to the CLARIN Language Resource Switchboard.
info.description:
**Directly send files from your personal cloud store to the CLARIN Language Resource Switchboard.**
This app extends the user interface of Nextcloud files app with an option to open the files in the Switchboard. Once clicked, a new browser tab opens with the Switchboard website pre-loaded for the selected file. From there, the user can discover a variety of language-related processing tools and call those tools with a single click.
When selecting multiple files within Nextcloud, an option button is also made available in the files-batch options section. This option will open a new tab with the Switchboard for each selected resource.
The files' settings section allows the configuration of a custom URL for the Switchboard. This is useful since there are multiple running instances, e.g. https://beta-switchboard.clarin.eu where the newest tools and feactures are available.
For more information about the CLARIN Language Resource Switchboard visit: - **https://switchboard.clarin.eu** - main running instance of the Switchboard - **https://github.com/clarin-eric/switchboard** - main repository for the Switchboard code - **https://github.com/clarin-eric/switchboard-tool-registry** - metadata repository for all the tools available in the Switchboard - **https://github.com/clarin-eric/switchboard-doc** - various documentation, e.g. API specs, integration of tools, integration in 3rd party applications (as is the case for this Nextcloud app)
